thread.title: Coronation Street spoiler: Leanne makes shocking baby decision and Michelle breaks down
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoiler: Leanne makes shocking baby decision and Michelle breaks down

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Coronation Street spoiler: Leanne makes shocking baby decision and Michelle breaks down
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
In tonight's episode of Coronation Street, Leanne makes a shocking decision about her baby. 
As Toyah snuggles up to the little one, Leanne reveals that they're planning on naming him Oliver. 
Confirming their excitement, Nick then announces that he's booked an appointment to register the name the following afternoon. Nick won't be happy (Photo: ITV) 
Later on in the day, the Platts pop over to see the new baby. 
Peter and Toyah both soon discover that they know Nick is not the baby's father, and admit that it must be hard for him. 
As the evening draws to a close, Leanne makes the tough decision to break to Nick that she doesn't want his name on the birth certificate. Read More Michelle braves seeing Leanne's newborn (Photo: ITV) She can't keep it together (Photo: ITV) 
Michelle, who previously lost her baby, later finds out that Leanne has given birth. 
She plans on visiting the newborn, and a horrified Steve realises that he has to play along with it even though he doesn't want to. 
It becomes a little too much for him, and Michelle ends up going to see the baby alone. 
Elsewhere, Aiden finally returns from Spain and is immediately annoyed when he finds Jenny chilling out in the factory office. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
